00020 /* \file OutputMessageStream.h Provides streaming messages to a ofstream from a component to its calling function. */
00021 
00022 #ifndef _OutputMessageStream_HEADER_
00023 #define _OutputMessageStream_HEADER_
00024 
00025 #include "util/MessageStream.h"
00026 //
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <ostream>
00029 //
00030 
00031 /*! Provides a base class definition for streaming back messages to the parent process. */
00032 class OutputMessageStream : public MessageStream
00033 {
00034 private:
00035         /*! Where to stream the messages. */
00036         std::ostream *outstr;
00037 
00038 public:
00039         /*! Construct a class with the type of output. 
00040          * @param level - level of verbosity desired.
00041          * @param strm The output stream.
00042          */
00043         OutputMessageStream(int level, std::ostream *strm = &std::cout);
00044 
00045         /*! Send a message.
00046          * @param level - level of verbosity desired.
00047          * @param msg The message to send.
00048          */
00049         void Write(int level, const std::string &msg);
00050 };
00051 
00052 #endif
